alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Charlotte and Lee Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lehigh Acres to near Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Punta Gorda, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Lovers Key State Park and Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
